docs.title: Home
docs.text:
Hi 👋 I am Tatsuki Tsujimoto

As a Software Engineer, my aspiration is to harness scientific knowledge and technology to craft solutions that genuinely aid people. I am particularly interested in back-end development in the medical, healthcare, and AI areas.

Portfolio Website: https://ttktjmt.com Source Code: https://github.com/ttktjmt/ttktjmt.com

docs.title: More About Me
docs.text:
•   I currently live in Kanagawa, Japan
  •   Check out the architecture of this website from the About Tab
  •   You can contact me at tatsuki.tsujimoto@gmail.com
  •   I speak Japanese, English, and a bit of German
  •   I like playing and watching basketball game!!
